definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: But it's possible the beams could impact low orbiting satellites on rare occassions.
sentences.chinese: 不过，粒子束可能会以非常小的机率影响低轨卫星。

sentences.english: Earth- or space- based lasers or particle beams could add initial oomph.
sentences.chinese: 地基或者是空基的激光或粒子束可以提供初速度。

sentences.english: One of them being Super Charged Particle Beams, and the other being Tiberium Core Missiles.
sentences.chinese: 其中之一就是超级充能粒子束，此外再就是泰核导弹。

sentences.english: In this paper the steady transmission of charged partical beam invacuum was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了带电粒子束在真空环境中的定常传输。

sentences.english: This pa-per describes the measuring method of density of neutral particle beam.
sentences.chinese: 描述了中性粒子束密度的测量方法。

sentences.english: In addition to just curving the beam, it is also necessary to focus it.
sentences.chinese: 四极磁铁在加速之余，我们也需要对粒子束进行调焦。
